scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -f .env.development sh -c 'ts-node script/init_and_seed.ts && ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only src/app.ts'
scripts.citest: npx prisma db push && mocha -r ts-node/register 'tests/**/*.test.ts' --exit --retries 2
scripts.prisma_migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -f .env.dev_local npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma_push_local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -f .env.dev_local npx prisma db push
scripts.prisma_push_production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -f .env.production npx prisma db push
scripts.reset_local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -f .env.development sh -c 'docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose --env-file .env.development -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build && sleep 10 && npx prisma db push'
scripts.reset_prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -f .env.production npx prisma migrate dev --name init
